title: Studio8 Central School type ID
content:
Hi, would really appreciate an ID on this please. Work by the fantastic but now defunct Studio 8. Appreciate it has likely been customised somewhat but just looking for the base typeface.

Many thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020123353im_/http:/typophile.com/files/435559815210_WmHDGxx9_l_4736.jpg)
author: danbo

comments.content: Thanks to [Akira](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020123353/http:/typophile.com/node/101383#comment-552938) who solved "Port Magazine" case, this one should be [Fogerty](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020123353/http:/mattwilley.co.uk/filter/Type/Central-School-of-Speech-Drama-Identity), "a custom font suite, named Fogerty after Central’s founder Elsie Fogerty, done in collaboration with Dalton Maag Type Foundry."
